mapper.select: select a.*,b.customer_id,b.customer_name, (select count(1) from wk_crm_contacts_user_star where contacts_id = a.contacts_id and user_id = #{userId}) as star from wk_crm_contacts as a left join wk_crm_customer as b on a.customer_id = b.customer_id where a.contacts_id = #{id}
select count(*) as businessCount from wk_crm_contacts_business as a inner join wk_crm_business as b on a.business_id = b.business_id where a.contacts_id = #{contactsId} and b.status = 1

select a.business_id,a.business_name,a.money,f.customer_name,d.name as type_name,e.name as status_name,a.is_end,a.status_id,a.type_id from wk_crm_business as a inner join wk_crm_contacts_business as b on a.business_id = b.business_id inner join wk_crm_contacts as c on b.contacts_id = c.contacts_id left join wk_crm_business_type as d on a.type_id = d.type_id left join wk_crm_business_status as e on a.status_id = e.status_id left join wk_crm_customer as f on a.customer_id = f.customer_id where c.contacts_id = #{contactsId}
